content:
Diagnosis
	1. Left breast cancer - tubular carcinoma
	   Date of diagnosis: March 2024
	   Treatment aim: Curative

	2. Right breast cancer - tubular carcinoma
	   Date of diagnosis: March 2024
	   Treatment aim: Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Mar 2024 Left mastectomy and axillary node clearance
	15 Mar 2024 Right wide local excision and sentinel lymph node biopsy

	Radiotherapy
	Planned

	Chemotherapy
	Planned

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	Post-operative recovery phase

	Current issues
	Post-operative pain

	Summary of consultation
	[redacted name] attended clinic today for initial oncology assessment following bilateral breast cancer surgery. She has made a good recovery from her operations with wounds healing well. She reports mild post-operative pain managed with regular paracetamol. No concerns regarding arm mobility or lymphoedema.

On examination, surgical sites are healing appropriately with no evidence of infection or seroma. No palpable axillary nodes. Normal arm movement bilaterally.

Histology confirms left breast Grade 2 tubular carcinoma, 3.2cm, with 4/12 positive axillary nodes. Right breast shows 1.8cm Grade 2 tubular carcinoma with 0/2 sentinel nodes positive. Both tumors are strongly ER positive (90%) and PR positive (85%). HER2 status equivocal (2+) - FISH testing in progress.

	Further investigations
	CT chest/abdomen/pelvis and bone scan for staging

	Medication prescribed
	None

	Follow up
	Review in 2 weeks with staging scan results and final HER2 status

	Required GP actions
	None at present

	Summary of information given to patient
	Discussed likely need for adjuvant chemotherapy followed by radiotherapy and endocrine therapy. Written information provided regarding chemotherapy. Breast care nurse present during consultation.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: Left breast: Grade 2 tubular carcinoma 3.2cm with 4/12 positive nodes. Right breast: Grade 2 tubular carcinoma 1.8cm with 0/2 nodes
primary_cancer.biomarker_status: ER positive (90%), PR positive (85%), HER2 2+ (FISH pending)

cancer_timeline.value: Left mastectomy and axillary node clearance
Right wide local excision and sentinel lymph node biopsy
Left breast: Grade 2 tubular carcinoma 3.2cm with 4/12 positive nodes
Right breast: Grade 2 tubular carcinoma 1.8cm with 0/2 nodes negative

patient_facts.value: Mild post-operative pain managed with regular paracetamol
Surgical sites healing appropriately with no infection or seroma

status_updates.value: Newly diagnosed bilateral breast cancer, post-operative assessment following left mastectomy and right wide local excision. Good post-operative recovery with plans for adjuvant therapy pending final staging
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis and bone scan for staging
Review in 2 weeks with staging scan results and final HER2 status
